cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Natural Resources on January 19, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2512, Chisholm National Historic Trail and Western National Historic Trail Designation Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 64 (Wednesday, April 14, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ESTES:
H.R. 2512.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
ARTICLE IV, SECTION 3, CLAUSE 2
The Congress shall have Power to dispose of and make all
needful Rules and Regulations respecting the Territory or
other Property belonging to the United States
[Page H1790]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 410.

title: Chisholm National Historic Trail and Western National Historic Trail Designation Act
